And this time, there's more than meets the eye.

Julie.

Righto, gang, here's the rules.
You've got 75 minutes to cook a dish
using one or more ingredients from that mystery box.
Pantry and garden today, they're closed,
but, of course, you've got the under-bench pantry staples.
Let's start with the good news.
The best dish from the Fans AND the best dish from the Favourites,
they'll win a fast-tracked place into this week's immunity challenge.

ANDY: Now for the bad news.
The bottom two dishes from each team,

where, unfortunately, one of you goes home.
Your job today,
don't let the first ever mystery box
be your last.

mystery boxes are a chance to really just, like, have a little bit of fun,
and there's not usually negative consequences.
So the fact that today,
the bottom two dishes from each team,
they're gonna go into a pressure test,
that's kind of a hard pill to swallow.

Your time starts now.

Let's do it!
Let's do it, let's do it, let's do it!

I couldn't find anyone that had a recipe that really worked for me,
